title: Design Issues on ( ███ ) Lead to show ( IPS of Users )

profile.name: Nextcloud
profile.about: Access, share and protect your files, calendars, contacts, communication & more at home and in your enterprise.

vulnerability_information:
Hello , 
 I know this Domain is maybe out of scope But it Connected to the main Website
 I have see it Cashable the Download IPS for Users Status.
As I saw that You active statics ( awstats ) That show me Full access to Status on the website .

                       ** POC **
https://███████/cgi-bin/awstats.pl?month=all&year=2017&config=██████&framename=mainright&output=unknownip

https://████████/cgi-bin/awstats.pl?output=alldomains&config=/../../../../../../../../../../proc/version&framename=index


███	18	27	100.26 MB	14 Feb 2017 - 23:55
█████████	18	26	208.19 MB	27 Mar 2017 - 10:26
█████████	18	19	644.44 MB	22 Feb 2017 - 10:36
████████	18	22	815.18 MB	21 Mar 2017 - 13:20
███████	18	27	99.94 MB	23 Mar 2017 - 13:06
█████████	18	36	306.92 MB	01 Mar 2017 - 18:28
███	18	77	1.05 GB	23 Mar 2017 - 09:27
█████	18	30	720.85 KB	01 Feb 2017 - 00:46
█████████	18	24	87.02 MB	22 Mar 2017 - 09:56


     
             ** Fix for Awstats  **

Restrict (or password protect) the access to directory or make it accessible only on the local interface.
vulnerability_information_html:
Hello ,
I know this Domain is maybe out of scope But it Connected to the main Website
I have see it Cashable the Download IPS for Users Status.
As I saw that You active statics ( awstats ) That show me Full access to Status on the website .

                   ** POC **

https://███████/cgi-bin/awstats.pl?month=all&year=2017&config=██████&framename=mainright&output=unknownip

https://████████/cgi-bin/awstats.pl?output=alldomains&config=/../../../../../../../../../../proc/version&framename=index

███ 18 27 100.26 MB 14 Feb 2017 - 23:55
█████████ 18 26 208.19 MB 27 Mar 2017 - 10:26
█████████ 18 19 644.44 MB 22 Feb 2017 - 10:36
████████ 18 22 815.18 MB 21 Mar 2017 - 13:20
███████ 18 27 99.94 MB 23 Mar 2017 - 13:06
█████████ 18 36 306.92 MB 01 Mar 2017 - 18:28
███ 18 77 1.05 GB 23 Mar 2017 - 09:27
█████ 18 30 720.85 KB 01 Feb 2017 - 00:46
█████████ 18 24 87.02 MB 22 Mar 2017 - 09:56

         ** Fix for Awstats  **

Restrict (or password protect) the access to directory or make it accessible only on the local interface.

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us!

Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We will reply to your report within 72 hours, usually much faster. For obvious reasons we'd like to ask you to not disclose this issue to any other party.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us!

Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We will reply to your report within 72 hours, usually much faster. For obvious reasons we'd like to ask you to not disclose this issue to any other party.

activities.message: Thanks. This should certainly not happen. I'll investigate why this is the case.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks. This should certainly not happen. I'll investigate why this is the case.

activities.message: While we don't award monetary rewards for our issues in our infrastructure we'd be happy to provide you with some swag.

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for your report again. This should be resolved now and has been caused by an invalided Apache config after a service update. 

Can you confirm on your end, that you can't access the page anymore?
